titleStmt.title: Instructions for the whole year. Part II. For Sundays being practical thoughts on the Epistles of all the Sundays and moveable feasts from the Octave of Easter to Quinquagesima Sunday.
Instructions for the whole year. Sundays
titleStmt.author: Gother, John, d. 1704.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to John Gother by Wing.
Place of publication suggested by Wing.
Reproduction of the original in the University of Texas, Austin Library.
